sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GTK-Doc package contains gtkdoc-fixxref, gtkdoc-mkdb, gtkdoc-mkhtml, gtkdoc-mkman, gtkdoc-mktmpl, gtkdoc-scan, gtkdoc-scangobj and gtkdoc-scanobj.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: These are all Perl scripts used by Makefile scripts to generate documentation for the package.
